# Introduction
## Introduction
### **Content:**
- Overview of the Higgs boson discovery and its implications for the Standard Model (SM).
- Discussion on Effective Field Theory (EFT) in Higgs physics.
- Topics covered: Higgs production and decay, precision electroweak measurements, future of Higgs physics.

##  Simplified Case
### Abelian Higgs Model


- Discuss a U(1) gauge theory with a single gauge field (photon).
- Lagrangian:

$$
  L = -\frac{1}{4}F_{\mu\nu}F^{\mu\nu}
$$

where 
$$
  F_{\mu\nu} = \partial_\nu A_\mu - \partial_\mu A_\nu
$$
